qa_list.question: Who are the authors of this text?
qa_list.answer: The authors of this text are Arun Kumar, Dhruv Arya, Murphy Austin, Venny Ayudiani, Priya Bagaria, Vidhisha Balachandran, and Ilyas Bankolehameed.
qa_list.ref_chunk: Arun Kumar Academic Program: Master of Science in Computational Data Science Email: harunkum@andrew.cmu.edu Dhruv Arya Academic Program: Master of Science in Computational Data Science Email: dhruvary@andrew.cmu.edu Murphy Austin Academic Program: Master of Science in Computational Data Science Email: murphyau@andrew.cmu.edu Venny Ayudiani Academic Program: Master of Science in Computational Data Science Email: vayudian@andrew.cmu.edu Priya Bagaria Academic Program: Master of Science in Computational Data Science Email: pbagaria@andrew.cmu.edu Vidhisha Balachandran Academic Program: Ph.D. in Language and Information Technology Email: vbalacha@andrew.cmu.edu Ilyas Bankolehameed Academic Program: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence and Innovation Email: ibankole@andrew.cmu.edu

qa_list.question: What academic programs do the authors of this text represent?
qa_list.answer: The authors of this text represent Master of Science in Computational Data Science (Arun Kumar, Dhruv Arya, Murphy Austin, Venny Ayudiani, Priya Bagaria) and Ph.D. in Language and Information Technology (Vidhisha Balachandran).
